transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you for calling Battery Smart! My name is Priya. How may I help you today?

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: hi my name is Mayank and I am having issues with my battery

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Hello! Welcome to Battery Smart. How can I help you today?

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: my battery is getting swollen what can I do

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I'd be happy to help! We offer battery swap services for electric scooters with over 500 stations across India. What would you like to know?

formatted_transcript:
Agent: Thank you for calling Battery Smart! My name is Priya. How may I help you today?

Customer: hi my name is Mayank and I am having issues with my battery

Agent: Hello! Welcome to Battery Smart. How can I help you today?

Customer: my battery is getting swollen what can I do

Agent: I'd be happy to help! We offer battery swap services for electric scooters with over 500 stations across India. What would you like to know?
